Description: 2 bed 1 bath in South End. Located in Massachusetts Ave. Garden Level Unit. Updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, hard wood floors throughout the unit, modern bath, spacious closets, outdoor space. Heat & hot water included in rent. Cat friendly, dogs negotiable. Laundry in building. Available September 1st, 2023.
